name: The Casa Chair
description: Clean lines and plush comfort make the Casa Chair a versatile seating solution for any room. Whether used as a dining chair or accent piece, it offers a supportive build with contemporary charm. Sculpted from solid wood, its flowing form hugs the body, blending natural warmth with a minimalist silhouette.

name: The Lowell Chair
description: A timeless accent with mid-century influence, the Lowell Chair balances angular arms and tapered legs with a generously cushioned seat. Wrapped in soft, neutral upholstery and grounded by a solid wood frame, it brings both structure and softness - perfect for reading corners, lounges, or curated living spaces.

name: The Nara Lounge Chair
description: With its sculpted wood frame and low-slung silhouette, the Nara Lounge Chair invites you to slow down. The contoured back and plush bouclé upholstery cradle the body, making it ideal for relaxed corners and reading nooks. A balance of handcrafted warmth and quiet elegance.

name: The Haven Rocker
description: The Haven Rocker combines clean-lined comfort with the timeless motion of a rocking chair. Its wide arms and padded seat offer cozy support, while the natural wood runners add a warm, grounding touch. Perfect for nurseries, reading spaces, or anywhere relaxation is required.

name: The Acacia Woven Chair
description: Handcrafted from solid acacia wood, the Acacia Woven Chair features a handwoven rope seat and back for breathable comfort. Its angled profile and open weave invite lounging under the sun or next to a breezy window. A timeless addition to patios, porches, or serene reading corners.

name: The Venice Chair
description: The Venice Chair is a study in contrasts. The softness of its curved back and upholstered seat is balanced by its angular base, where a void welcomes conversation between light and shadow. Handcrafted at a family-owned workroom in upstate New York.

name: The Ribbon Chair
description:
The Ribbon Chair is a sculptural nod to romance and whimsy.
With its hand-bent iron backrest shaped like a flowing bow, and its delicate cushion tied with soft fabric ribbons, it turns any vanity or corner into a dreamy vignette. Designed for charm as much as comfort.

name: The Cocoon Chair
description:
The Cocoon Chair cradles you in quiet luxury.
Hand-carved from rich hardwood and paired with plush, cloud-like cushions, this sculptural seat merges comfort and form with poetic ease. Designed to ground a space, soften its edges, and invite rest — all at once.
